events.text:
Hey there! I'm a talking sign! That's right, I'm not like the other signs... I'm special! I can speak! Isn't that awesome? Aren't I amazing?
... Right? I am, right?
Please tell me you believe in me! I need the encouragement! It's the power source that fuels my ability to speak. Without it, I'll become a normal sign...
I don't want that. I don't want to be normal.
I need to be awesome!!!
